DOC.brief_summary: This study in individuals with early Alzheimer's disease is designed to assess:(1) safety and tolerability (2) the capacity of ACC-001 and QS-21 adjuvant to reduce brain amyloid load as measured by positron emission tomography (PET) scans.
DOC.brief_title: Amyloid Imaging And Safety Study Of ACC-001 In Subjects With Early Alzheimer's Disease
